ingredients: 1/4 each red, yellow and green bell pepper, thinly sliced (Alternatively, use three-quarters of any variety of bell pepper.)
2 tsp fresh thyme leaves, chopped, divided
Fresh ground black pepper, to taste
1 oz all-natural uncured sliced black forest ham, sliced into strips (TRY: Applegate Naturals Uncured Black Forest Ham)
1/2 oz sliced low-fat provolone cheese, sliced into strips
